## TGlInstancedEntityRenderer type

Either a wgl1 renderer with extension `ANGLE_instanced_arrays` or wgl2 renderer.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare type TGlInstancedEntityRenderer = TGl1EntityRenderer<"ANGLE_instanced_arrays"> | TGl2EntityRenderer;
```
